articles.author: Elizabeth Wolfe, CNN
articles.title: 3 people killed in a shooting at an Indiana shopping mall
articles.description: Three people are dead and two others hospitalized after a shooter opened fire in the food court of a Greenwood, Indiana, shopping mall Sunday evening, police say.
articles.content:
(CNN)Three people are dead and two others hospitalized after a shooter opened fire in the food court of a Greenwood, Indiana, shopping mall Sunday evening, police say.

articles.title: Conway predicts Trump will run again. Hear who he thinks can beat him - CNN Video
articles.description: Conservative attorney George Conway, who is now a fierce critic of former President Donald Trump, predicts that Trump will run for president again and says Ron DeSantis may be the only candidate that can beat him one-on-one.

articles.title: Video: Victim's father confronts Uvalde mayor over why he was kicked out of meeting - CNN Video
articles.description: Alfred Garza, whose daughter Amerie Jo Garza was one of the 19 children killed in the Robb Elementary School shooting, confronts Uvalde Mayor Don MacLaughlin after Garza was escorted out of a meeting for the victims' families.

articles.title: Video: Bodycam from Uvalde shooting shows what unfolded after police arrived - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Shimon Prokupecz reports on the release of bodycam footage from law enforcement officers who were at the scene of the Robb Elementary School shooting in Uvalde, Texas.

articles.author: Shimon Prokupecz and Matthew J. Friedman, CNN
articles.title: First on CNN: Uvalde video shows children scrambling for safety and a chief fumbling with door keys
articles.description: Dramatic new video of first responders at Robb Elementary School shows a close-up view of the action -- and inaction -- of the law enforcement response to the unfolding massacre.

articles.title: Opinion: The fear of gun violence is ending my American dream
articles.description: CNN's Adam Charlton writes that America's gun violence has made him and his family feel so unsafe, they've decided to go back home to the UK.

articles.title: Ted Cruz says Supreme Court was 'clearly wrong' about 2015 same-sex marriage ruling
articles.description: Sen. Ted Cruz believes the US Supreme Court was "clearly wrong" in its landmark 2015 Obergefell v. Hodges ruling that legalized same-sex marriage, the Texas Republican said Saturday.

articles.author: Ray Sanchez and Peter Nickeas, CNN
articles.title: What we learned from the Uvalde shooting video, and what remains unknown
articles.description: The video of law enforcement response to the Robb Elementary School shooting sheds no light on why officers waited so long to confront the gunman, nor does it reveal who was responsible for the delay. In fact, the video raises more questions than answers.
